price: 79. (Alle) waa Kan idinku fidiyey dhulka, Xaggiisaana la idiin soo kulmin.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī dhara-akum fī al-arḍi wa-ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
